description:
Unlocking Private Tuition: Learn to Tutor Today

In under one hour, you could be a private tutor.Sounds exciting right? You will have to do a little work (sorry!) but I am sure you know that by this point in the process. 

This course,brought to you by Fireside Education, will guide you through your first steps and give experience-based advice on your future work as a private tutor. This fully animated course has 14 succinct lectures, written materials,templates, and an end-of-course quiz. 

Lectures Include:

  1. Introduction
  2. What does a tutor do?
  3. What can you tutor?
  4. Where can you tutor?
  5. Legal Protection.
  6. Getting Qualified.
  7. Pricing Structure.
  8. Constructing a Customer Base.
  9. Prep Your Lessons: Tools to Succeed.
  10. Prep Your Lessons: Long-Term Lesson Plans.
  11. Prep Your Lessons: Handouts.
  12. Making the Right Impression.
  13. On my CV.
  14. Are you on course to tutor?


Please submit any feedback or suggestions to fireside@fireside-education.co.uk.
title: Unlocking Private Tuition: Learn to Tutor Today
